dialogue.introduction: I'm Ikazuchi! Not 'Kaminari'! Please take care of that part too, okay!
dialogue.library_intro: Together with my fellow destroyer Inazuma at the Battle of Surabaya, we rescued the survivors of the sunk enemy's ships. I think that strength just isn't enough. Don't you agree, Commander!?
dialogue.secretary1: You look down... That's no good, you know?
dialogue.secretary3: Yeah, you can rely on me all you want!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Oh, Isn't there anything you have to do? Well…… you may count on me more!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, you're alright. Of course, it's because I'm beside you!
dialogue.wedding: Hey Commander? If I wasn't here, there wouldn't be a fleet, right? Yeah?
dialogue.show_players_score: A letter's arrived for you, Commander. Can I see it?
dialogue.equipment2: How's the improved me's charm? Eh? You didn't notice? Meanie~!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Look's like repairs will take a while, sorry...
dialogue.docking_complete: The ship gotten back from repairing is here.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship is done. Let's get her to the front quickly.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet's back, thanks for the hard work!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Ikazuchi will fight for the Commander's sake!
dialogue.attack: You think an attack like that's gonna hit?
dialogue.night_battle: Not saying the Tokyo Express is bad, but combat is great!
dialogue.night_attack: If you're gonna run, it's now or never!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: If you're gonna run, it's now or never!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: If you're gonna run, it's now or never!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: If you're gonna run, it's now or never!
dialogue.mvp: Did they think they could challenge the mighty Ikazuchi? Right, commander? Huh? Are you listening?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: What, already! Ikazuchi will still be okay!
dialogue.sunk: Commander...where are you...? I can't hear your voice anymore...
dialogue.fall_2015: Ikazuchi is going to work a lot harder for the commander, yeah?...Eh, you're happy?
